titleStmt.title: Mr. George Keith's account of a national church, and the clergy, &c. humbly presented to the Bishop of London : with some queries concerning the Sacrament.
Account of a national church and the clergy
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by the Booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: "Made up of extracts from Keith's work, written while he was a member of the Society of Friends, and ... published in London in 1700, after he had joined the Church of England, by some of his former co-religionists." cf. Hildeburn 82.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
